title: Why does Shaka Smart continue to fail in postseason?
text:
**First Graph Starts


Code
totalpoints <- logs |> 
  group_by(season, team_display_name) |> 
  summarize(
    total_games = n(),
    total_points_scored = sum(team_score),
    total_points_allowed = sum(opponent_team_score)
  ) |> 
  filter(total_points_scored > 300) |> 
  mutate(
    season_ppg = total_points_scored / total_games,
    season_dppg = total_points_allowed / total_games
  ) |> 
  mutate(team_season = paste(team_display_name, season))

winning <- logs |> 
  mutate(Win = case_when(team_score > opponent_team_score ~ 1, team_score < opponent_team_score ~ 0)) |> 
  group_by(team_display_name, season) |> 
  summarize(
    games = n(),
    wins = sum(Win)
  ) |> 
  mutate(team_season = paste(team_display_name, season))

shakateamwinning <- winning |> 
  filter(team_display_name == "VCU Rams" | team_display_name == "Texas Longhorns" | team_display_name == "Marquette Golden Eagles" )

shakavcu <- shakateamwinning |> filter(team_display_name == "VCU Rams") |> filter(season >= 2010 & season <= 2015)
shakatex <- shakateamwinning |> filter(team_display_name == "Texas Longhorns") |> filter(season >= 2016 & season <= 2021) 
shakamar <- shakateamwinning |> filter(team_display_name == "Marquette Golden Eagles") |> filter(season >= 2022 & season <= 2025)

  ggplot() + 
  geom_line(data=shakateamwinning, aes(x=season, y=wins, group = team_display_name), color="grey") +
  geom_line(data=shakavcu, aes(x=season, y=wins, group = team_display_name), color="#FFB300", linewidth=2) +  
  geom_line(data=shakatex, aes(x=season, y=wins, group = team_display_name), color="#bf5700", linewidth=2) +  
  geom_line(data=shakamar, aes(x=season, y=wins, group = team_display_name), color="#003366", linewidth=2) +
  labs(
    x="Season", 
    y="Number of Wins", 
    title="Shaka's Slippery Slope", 
    subtitle="How did Shaka Smart impact these programs during his tenure?", 
    caption="Source: SPMC 350 | By Ben Anderson"
    ) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 20, face = "bold"),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 10), 
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size=13), 
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
    plot.title.position = "plot",
     plot.background = element_rect(fill = "white")
    ) 









**Second Graph Starts


Code
shaka_data_new$Round <- case_when(
  grepl("FIRST-FOUR", shaka_data_new$Type) ~ "First Four",
  grepl("ROUND-64", shaka_data_new$Type) ~ "Round of 64",
  grepl("ROUND-32", shaka_data_new$Type) ~ "Round of 32",
  grepl("ROUND-16", shaka_data_new$Type) ~ "Round of 16",
  grepl("ROUND-8", shaka_data_new$Type) ~ "Round of 8",
  grepl("FINAL-4", shaka_data_new$Type) ~ "Final Four",
  grepl("CHAMPIONSHIP", shaka_data_new$Type) ~ "Championship"
)

shaka_data_new$Loss <- ifelse(shaka_data_new$Result == "L", 1, 0) 

round_order <- c("First Four", "Round of 64", "Round of 32", "Round of 16", "Round of 8", "Final Four", "Championship")

shaka_data_new$Round_Factor <- factor(shaka_data_new$Round, levels = round_order)
shaka_data_new$Round_Num <- as.numeric(factor(shaka_data_new$Round, levels = round_order))

farthest_round <- shaka_data_new |> 
  group_by(Year) |> 
  summarise(
    farthest_round = max(Round_Num, na.rm = TRUE),
    avg_opponent_seed = mean(as.integer(OPSeed), na.rm = TRUE)
  )

farthest_round$Color <- case_when(
  farthest_round$Year %in% c("2011", "2012", "2013", "2014" , "2015") ~ "VCU",
  farthest_round$Year %in% c("2016", "2017", "2018" , "2019" , "2020" , "2021") ~ "Texas",
  farthest_round$Year %in% c("2022" , "2023" , "2024" , "2025") ~ "Marquette",
  TRUE ~ "Other"
)

ggplot(farthest_round, aes(x = Year, y = as.integer(farthest_round), fill = Color)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", color = "black") +
  geom_text(aes(label = paste("Avg. Seed: ", round(avg_opponent_seed, 1))),
            vjust = -0.5, color = "black", size = 1.25) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = 1:7, labels = round_order) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c(
     "VCU" = "#FFB81C",
    "Texas" = "#BF5700",  
    "Marquette" = "#003366" 
  )) +
  ggtitle("Shaka Smart's Farthest Round Reached in NCAA Tournament per Year") +
  xlab("Year") +
  ylab("Farthest Round Reached") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "white")
  )









** Third Graph Starts


Code
postseason_data <- shaka_data_new |> 
  filter(grepl("ROUND", Type)) 


team_stats <- postseason_data |> 
  group_by(Year) |> 
  summarise(
    avg_points_for = mean(Tm, na.rm = TRUE),  
    avg_points_against = mean(Opp, na.rm = TRUE),  
    avg_fgm = mean(FG, na.rm = TRUE),
    avg_fga = mean(FGA, na.rm = TRUE),  
    avg_turnovers = mean(TOV, na.rm = TRUE),  
    avg_fg_pct = mean(FGP, na.rm = TRUE),  
    avg_3p_pct = mean(ThreePP, na.rm = TRUE)  
  )


team_efficiency <- team_stats |> 
  mutate(
    shooting_efficiency = avg_fgm / avg_fga * 100,  
    offensive_efficiency = avg_points_for / (avg_points_for + avg_points_against),  
    turnover_efficiency = 1 / (1 + avg_turnovers), 
    overall_efficiency = (shooting_efficiency + offensive_efficiency * 100 + avg_3p_pct + turnover_efficiency * 100) / 4  
  )


highlight_2011_data <- team_efficiency |> 
  filter(Year == "2011")


ggplot() +

  geom_point(
    data = team_efficiency,
    aes(x = avg_points_for, y = overall_efficiency),
    color = "grey", size = 4, shape = 16
  ) +

  geom_point(
    data = highlight_2011_data,
    aes(x = avg_points_for, y = overall_efficiency),
    color = "royalblue", size = 5, shape = 16
  ) +

  geom_text(
    data = highlight_2011_data,
    aes(x = avg_points_for, y = overall_efficiency, label = "2011"),
    size = 4, vjust = -1.5, color = "black" 
  ) +

  geom_text(
    data = team_efficiency |>   filter(Year != "2011"),
    aes(x = avg_points_for, y = overall_efficiency, label = Year),
    size = 4, vjust = -1.5, color = "black"
  ) +
  geom_text(
    data = team_efficiency |> filter(Year == "2013"),
    aes(x = avg_points_for, y = overall_efficiency, label = "2013"),
    size = 4, vjust = 1.5, color = "black"
  ) +
  labs(
    title = "Shaka Smart's Postseason Team Efficiency",
    subtitle = "Comparing Shaka Smart's teams' performance in postseason by year.",
    x = "Average Points Scored",
    y = "Overall Team Efficiency",
    caption = "By: Ben Anderson | Source: Sports Reference"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10),
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
    plot.title.position = "plot",
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "white"),
    legend.position = "none"
  )
